import React, { useState, useRef } from 'react'; import { Search, ShoppingCart, ChevronDown, Menu, X, BookOpen } from 'lucide-react'; // Navigation Component const Navbar = ({ setCurrentPage }) => { const [isMobileMenuOpen, setIsMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [isCategoriesMenuOpen, setIsCategoriesMenuOpen] = useState(false); const categories = [ 'Development', 'Business', 'Finance & Accounting', 'IT & Software', 'Office Productivity', 'Personal Development', 'Design', 'Marketing', 'Lifestyle', 'Photography & Video', 'Health & Fitness', 'Music', 'Teaching & Academics' ]; const searchInputRef = useRef(null); return (
{isCategoriesMenuOpen && (
setIsCategoriesMenuOpen(true)} onMouseLeave={() => setIsCategoriesMenuOpen(false)} className="absolute left-0 mt-2 w-64 bg-white rounded-md shadow-lg py-1 z-20" > {categories.slice(0,10).map(category => ( ))}
)}
{isMobileMenuOpen && (
)}
); }; export default Navbar;
